api_list.name: ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt4-api.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt4-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
